title.ulink: Marcus Hüwe: GSoC – new osc user interface proposal

blockquote.para: as a part of our Google Summer of Code Project to cleanup osc our first task was to define a new commandline user interface for osc. The current user interface is quite “inconsistent” (with regard to the expected arguments for different commands) and has some other “flaws”. Here are some examples to show some flaws of the current user interface: (...)
